admiral-ackbar-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-ackbar-commander.name: Admiral Ackbar
admiral-ackbar-commander.ability: Before a friendly ship's Attack step, it may choose to attack from only its left and right hull zones this round. If it does, it may add 2 red dice to its attack pool while attacking a ship.

admiral-konstantine-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-konstantine-commander.name: Admiral Konstantine
admiral-konstantine-commander.ability: At the start of each Status Phase, you may choose any number of enemy ships at distance 1-5 of at least 2 friendly non-flotilla ships, 1 of which must be of medium or larger size class. For each chosen ship you may discard 1 :nav: token from it or increase or decrease that enemy ship's speed by 1 to a minimum of speed 1.

admiral-motti-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-motti-commander.name: Admiral Motti
admiral-motti-commander.ability:
The hull value of each friendly ship is increased according to its size class:
Small ship: 1
Medium ship: 2
Large ship: 3

admiral-ozzel-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-ozzel-commander.name: Admiral Ozzel
admiral-ozzel-commander.ability: During each friendly ship's Determine Course step, it may change its speed by 1.

admiral-piett-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-piett-commander.name: Admiral Piett
admiral-piett-commander.ability: When a friendly ship spends only a command token to resolve a command, you may exhaust this card. If you do, that ship resolves that command as if it had spent a dial of the same type instead.

admiral-raddus-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-raddus-commander.name: Admiral Raddus
admiral-raddus-commander.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may set aside 1 other friendly ship. At the start of any round, you may deploy that ship at distance 1 of a friendly ship. That ship cannot be deployed overlapping squadrons and cannot be the first ship to activate that round.

admiral-screed-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-screed-commander.name: Admiral Screed
admiral-screed-commander.ability: Once per activation, when a friendly ship is attacking, it may spend 1 die to change a die to a face with a :critical: icon.

admiral-sloane-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-sloane-commander.name: Admiral Sloane
admiral-sloane-commander.ability: While a friendly squadron without Rogue is attacking, it may spend 1 die with an :accuracy: icon to choose and spend 1 of the defender's defense tokens. While attacking a ship, it may also reroll 1 die with a :critical: icon.

admiral-tarkin-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-tarkin-commander.name: Admiral Tarkin
admiral-tarkin-commander.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may discard 1 command token from this card. If you do, either you gain 1 matching command dial, or each friendly ship gains 1 matching command token.

admiral-trench-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-trench-commander.name: Admiral Trench
admiral-trench-commander.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 command dial from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when a friendly ship spends only a matching command token to resolve a command, that ship resolves that command as if it had spent a dial and token of the same type instead.

admiral-yularen-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-yularen-commander.name: Admiral Yularen
admiral-yularen-commander.ability: When a friendly ship resolves a :squadron: command, if it spend a :squadron: token, it may activate 1 additional squadron. When a friendly ship resolves a :repair: command, it may spend engineering points on the following repair effect: Repair Squadron: Spend 2 points to choose a friendly squadron at distance 1-3. That squadron recovers 1 hull point.

anakin-skywalker-commander.author: Atomic Mass Games
anakin-skywalker-commander.name: Anakin Skywalker
anakin-skywalker-commander.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, if the defender is at distance 1-5 of at least 2 other friendly ships, 1 other friendly ship at distance 1-5 of the defender may spend 1 defense token. If it does, the attacker may reroll up to 3 dice.

bail-organa-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
bail-organa-commander.name: Bail Organa
bail-organa-commander.ability: When a friendly ship reveals a command, you may discard up to 1 token of each type from this card. For each token you discard, that ship gains 1 additional command dial matching that token's type.

commander-sato-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
commander-sato-commander.name: Commander Sato
commander-sato-commander.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship at distance 1 of a friendly squadron, before rolling attack dice, the attacker may replace up to 2 dice in its attack pool with an equal number of dice of any color or colors.

count-dooku-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
count-dooku-commander.name: Count Dooku
count-dooku-commander.ability: You must choose at least 2 types of command tokens for this card. At the start of each Ship Phase, you may discard 1 command token from this card. If you do, each enemy ship gains a raid token matching that command token.

darth-vader-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
darth-vader-commander.name: Darth Vader
darth-vader-commander.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may spend 1 defense token to reroll any number of dice in its attack pool.

emperor-palpatine-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
emperor-palpatine-commander.name: Emperor Palpatine
emperor-palpatine-commander.ability: After deploying fleets, place 1 defense token of each type on this card. At the start of each Ship Phase you may discard 1 of those tokens. If you do, until the end of the round, if an enemy ship or squadron spends a matching token during its Spend Defense Tokens step, discard that token.

garm-bel-iblis-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
garm-bel-iblis-commander.expansion: Assault Frigate Mark II Expansion Pack SWM05
garm-bel-iblis-commander.name: Garm Bel Iblis
garm-bel-iblis-commander.ability: After deploying fleets, place 2 non-consecutive round tokens on this card. At the start of the Ship Phase during each round matching 1 of those tokens, each friendly ship may gain a number of command tokens equal to its command value.

general-cracken-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-cracken-commander.name: General Cracken
general-cracken-commander.ability: While a friendly small or medium ship is defending against a ship, if the defender is at speed 3 or higher, the attack is treated as obstructed.

general-dodonna-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-dodonna-commander.name: General Dodonna
general-dodonna-commander.ability: Before an enemy ship is dealt a faceup damage card, look at the top 4 cards of the damage deck, place 1 on top of the deck and discard the others.

general-draven-commander.author: Atomic Mass Games
general-draven-commander.name: General Draven
general-draven-commander.ability:
Choose command dials for this card after deploying fleets.
At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 command dial from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when an enemy ship spends a matching command dial, it resolves that dial as though it spent a token of the same type instead. .

general-grievous-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-grievous-commander.name: General Grievous
general-grievous-commander.ability: When a friendly ship or squadron is destroyed, you may choose 1 friendly ship or unique squadron at distance 1-5 of the destroyed ship or squadron. If you do, the chosen ship or unique squadron may either ready 1 of its defense tokens or recover 1 of its discarded defense tokens and then exhaust that token.

general-madine-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-madine-commander.name: General Madine
general-madine-commander.ability: When a friendly ship resolves a Icon Command Navigate command, if it spent a Icon Command Navigate dial it may increase 1 additional yaw value by 1. If it spent a Icon Command Navigate token, it may either change its speed or increase 1 yaw value by 1.

general-rieekan-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-rieekan-commander.name: General Rieekan
general-rieekan-commander.ability: Once per round, when a friendly ship or friendly unique squadron is destroyed, it remains in the play area and is treated as if it was not destroyed until the end of the Status Phase.

general-romodi-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-romodi-commander.name: General Romodi
general-romodi-commander.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, if the attack is obstructed by a ship or obstacle, the attacker does not remove a die (even if the attack is also obstructed by a card effect), and may add 1 red die to the attack pool.

general-tagge-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
general-tagge-commander.name: General Tagge
general-tagge-commander.ability: After deploying fleets, place 2 non-consecutive round tokens on this card. At the start of the Ship Phase during each round matching 1 of those tokens each friendly ship may recover 1 of its discarded defense tokens.

grand-admiral-thrawn-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
grand-admiral-thrawn-commander.name: Grand Admiral Thrawn
grand-admiral-thrawn-commander.ability:
Choose command dials for this card after deploying fleets.
At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 dial from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when each friendly ship activates, it gains 1 additional dial matching that discarded dial.

grand-moff-tarkin-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
grand-moff-tarkin-commander.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
grand-moff-tarkin-commander.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may choose 1 command. Each friendly ship gains a command token matching that command.

kraken-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
kraken-commander.name: Kraken
kraken-commander.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is attacking a ship, if another friendly ship is at close-medium range of the defender, the attacker may change 1 die to a face with any 1 icon (and no other icons).

kyrsta-agate-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
kyrsta-agate-commander.name: Kyrsta Agate
kyrsta-agate-commander.ability:
After you deploy, gain 1 non-:scatter: defense token.
During your "Spend Defense Tokens" step, if your speed is not 0, you may discard 1 defense token to resolve the effect of that defense token. You cannot resolve the effect of each type of defense token more than once per attack.

leia-organa-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
leia-organa-commander.name: Leia Organa
leia-organa-commander.ability: When a friendly ship resolves a command by spending a command dial, if it has not resolved another command this round, it may resolve that command as if it also spent a matching command token. If it does, that ship cannot resolve additional commands this round.

luminara-unduli-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
luminara-unduli-commander.name: Luminara Unduli
luminara-unduli-commander.ability: While a friendly ship or unique squadron is defending, after the Spend Defense Tokens step, if it spent fewer than 2 defense tokens, it may either ready 1 of its defense tokens it did not spend, or choose another friendly ship at distance 1-5 and ready 1 of that ship's defense tokens.

mar-tuuk-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
mar-tuuk-commander.name: Mar Tuuk
mar-tuuk-commander.ability:
While a friendly ship is attacking, if the defending hull zone has at least 1 shield remaining, the attacker may add 1 red die to its attack pool.
While a friendly ship is attacking a ship that has no shields remaining, after rolling the attack dice, the attacker must cancel 1 attack die.

moff-jerjerrod-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
moff-jerjerrod-commander.name: Moff Jerjerrod
moff-jerjerrod-commander.ability: While a friendly ship executes a maneuver, during the Determine Course step, that ship may suffer 1 damage to change the first yaw value of that maneuver to 'II'.

mon-mothma-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
mon-mothma-commander.name: Mon Mothma
mon-mothma-commander.ability: When a friendly ship resolves the :evade: token effect, it can cancel 1 die at medium range or reroll 1 additional die at close range or distance 1.

obi-wan-kenobi-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
obi-wan-kenobi-commander.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
obi-wan-kenobi-commander.ability: While a friendly ship is defending, when it spends a readied :redirect: token, it may reduce the total damage by 1 before it suffers damage.

plo-koon-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
plo-koon-commander.name: Plo Koon
plo-koon-commander.ability: While a friendly squadron is attacking a ship that is at distance 1-3 of a friendly ship, the attacker may add 1 blue die set to an [accuracy] icon to its attack pool. That die cannot be rerolled or changed. Friendly squadrons without adept gain grit while they are at distance 1 of a friendly squadron with adept.

tf-1726-commander.author: Fantasy Flight Games
tf-1726-commander.name: TF-1726
tf-1726-commander.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is attacking a ship, the attacker adds 1 black die to its attack pool for each raid token the defender has, to a maximum of 2 additional dice.

advanced-projectors.author: Fantasy Flight Games
advanced-projectors.expansion: Assault Frigate Mark II Expansion Pack SWM05
advanced-projectors.name: Advanced Projectors
advanced-projectors.ability: When you resolve the :redirect: token effect, you can choose more than one hull zone to suffer damage, which may include a nonadjacent hull zone

cluster-bombs.author: Fantasy Flight Games
cluster-bombs.name: Cluster Bombs
cluster-bombs.ability: After a squadron performs an attack against you, even if you are destroyed, you may discard this card to roll 4 blue dice. That squadron suffers 1 damage for each :hit: or :critical: icon rolled.

early-warning-system.author: Fantasy Flight Games
early-warning-system.name: Early Warning System
early-warning-system.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may choose 1 of your hull zones and mark it with a chaff token. Until the end of the round, while a ship or squadron is attacking that hull zone, the attack is obstructed. After the Status Phase, remove that chaff token.

electronic-countermeasures.author: Fantasy Flight Games
electronic-countermeasures.name: Electronic Countermeasures
electronic-countermeasures.ability: While defending you may exhaust this card to spend 1 defense token that your opponent targeted with an :accuracy: result.

reactive-gunnery.author: Fantasy Flight Games
reactive-gunnery.name: Reactive Gunnery
reactive-gunnery.ability: While defending, you may exhaust this card and spend a readied defense token to resolve the :salvo: defense effect instead of that token's effect. You cannot resolve the :salvo: defense effect more than once per attack.

redundant-shields.author: Fantasy Flight Games
redundant-shields.name: Redundant Shields
redundant-shields.ability:
_Modification_. 
At the start of each Status Phase, you may recover 1 shield.

reinforced-blast-doors.author: Fantasy Flight Games
reinforced-blast-doors.name: Reinforced Blast Doors
reinforced-blast-doors.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card to discard up to 3 of your facedown damage cards.

thermal-shields.author: Fantasy Flight Games
thermal-shields.name: Thermal Shields
thermal-shields.ability: While defending, after the attacker gathers dice, you may spend 1 :brace: token. If you do, choose and remove half of the dice in the attack pool, rounded down.

g7x-grav-well-projector.author: Fantasy Flight Games
g7x-grav-well-projector.name: G7-X Grav Well Projector
g7x-grav-well-projector.ability:
Before deploying fleets, place 1 grav well token anywhere in the play area.
When a ship deploys at distance 1-3 of a grav well token, its speed dial must be set to 0.

g8-experimental-projector.author: Fantasy Flight Games
g8-experimental-projector.name: G-8 Experimental Projector
g8-experimental-projector.ability: Before an enemy ship at distance 1-5 resolves the Determine Course step, you may exhaust this card to temporarily reduce its speed by 1 to a minimum of speed 0 until the end of the maneuver.

grav-shift-reroute.author: Fantasy Flight Games
grav-shift-reroute.name: Grav Shift Reroute
grav-shift-reroute.ability:
Before deploying fleets, place 1 grav shift token anywhere in the play area.
After deploying fleets, you may move each obstacle at distance 1-3 of that token to within distance 1-2 of that obstacle's current location. Obstacles cannot overlap tokens, obstacles, or ships.

targeting-scrambler.author: Fantasy Flight Games
targeting-scrambler.name: Targeting Scrambler
targeting-scrambler.ability: While a friendly ship at distance 1-3 is defending at close range, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may exhaust this card to force the attacker to reroll up to 4 dice of your choice.

all-fighters-follow-me.author: Fantasy Flight Games
all-fighters-follow-me.name: All Fighters, Follow Me!
all-fighters-follow-me.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :squadron: token. If you do, until the end of the round, the speed of each squadron that a friendly ship activates is increased by 1, to a maximum of 5, until the end of that squadron's activation.

entrapment-formation.author: Fantasy Flight Games
entrapment-formation.name: Entrapment Formation!
entrapment-formation.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :nav: token. If you do, until the end of the round, each friendly ship may change its speed by 1 during its Determine Course step.

hot-landing.author: Fantasy Flight Games
hot-landing.name: Hot Landing
hot-landing.ability: At the start of the Squadron Phase, friendly squadrons with adept gain grit until the end of the phase. When a friendly squadron with adept is destroyed, you may choose 1 enemy ship at distance 1-2 of that squadron. If you do, that ship gains 1 raid token of your choice.

intensify-firepower.author: Fantasy Flight Games
intensify-firepower.name: Intensify Firepower!
intensify-firepower.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :confire: token. If you do, until the end of the round, while each friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may change 1 die to a face with 1 :hit: icon and no other icons.

jedi-hostage.author: Fantasy Flight Games
jedi-hostage.name: Jedi Hostage
jedi-hostage.ability: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of a non-:salvo: attack, if this card is readied, the attacker gains a raid token of its choice, if able. When an enemy ship at close range reveals a command, it may discard a :squadron: dial to exhaust this card. While defending, if this card is exhausted, you cannot spend more than 1 defense token.

mercy-mission.author: Fantasy Flight Games
mercy-mission.name: Mercy Mission
mercy-mission.ability: Before deploying fleets, un-equip this card and choose 1 friendly small ship that is not your flagship. Equip this card to the chosen ship (even if it does not have a :fleet command: icon in its upgrade bar). At the end of the game, if you are within the enemy deployment zone, increase your score by 40 points; if you were destroyed, increase your fleet value by 20 points.

shields-to-maximum.author: Fantasy Flight Games
shields-to-maximum.name: Shields to Maximum!
shields-to-maximum.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :repair: token. If you do, until the end of the round, before a friendly ship reveals a command, it may recover 1 shield.

take-evasive-action.author: Fantasy Flight Games
take-evasive-action.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
take-evasive-action.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
take-evasive-action.name: Take Evasive Action!
take-evasive-action.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :nav: token. If you do, until the end of the round, each friendly ship may increase the last yaw value of its current speed by 1 during its Determine Course step.

bomber-command-center.author: Fantasy Flight Games
bomber-command-center.name: Bomber Command Center
bomber-command-center.ability: While a friendly squadron with Bomber at distance 1-5 is attacking a ship, it may reroll 1 die.

comms-net.author: Fantasy Flight Games
comms-net.name: Comms Net
comms-net.ability: After the Reveal Command Dial Step, you may remove 1 command token from this ship to assign a matching token to another friendly ship at distance 1-5.

jamming-field.author: Fantasy Flight Games
jamming-field.name: Jamming Field
jamming-field.ability: While a squadron at distance 1-2 is attacking a squadron or defending against a squadron, the attack must be treated as obstructed.

munitions-resupply.author: Fantasy Flight Games
munitions-resupply.name: Munitions Resupply
munitions-resupply.ability: While defending, you may exhaust this card and spend a readied defense token to resolve the :salvo: defense effect instead of that token's effect. You cannot resolve the :salvo: defense effect more than once per attack.

parts-resupply.author: Fantasy Flight Games
parts-resupply.name: Parts Resupply
parts-resupply.ability: After your Reveal Command Dial step, you may exhaust this card and discard any number of :repair: tokens from it to choose that many friendly ships at distance 1-5. Assign each chosen ship a :repair: token.

repair-crews.author: Fantasy Flight Games
repair-crews.name: Repair Crews
repair-crews.ability: :repair:: Instead of spending engineering points, you may discard 1 damage card from 1 friendly ship at distance 1-2.

slicer-tools.author: Fantasy Flight Games
slicer-tools.name: Slicer Tools
slicer-tools.ability: After you execute a maneuver, you may exhaust this card to choose an enemy ship at distance 1-3. You may choose a new command on its top command dial.

heavy-ion-emplacements.author: Fantasy Flight Games
heavy-ion-emplacements.name: Heavy Ion Emplacements
heavy-ion-emplacements.ability: BLUE :crit: : You may exhaust this card. If you do, the defending hull zone and each adjacent hull zone loses 1 shield.

high-capacity-ion-turbines.author: Fantasy Flight Games
high-capacity-ion-turbines.name: High-Capacity Ion Turbines
high-capacity-ion-turbines.ability:
Modification.
The battery armaments for your left and right hull zones are increased by 1 blue die.

ion-cannon-batteries.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ion-cannon-batteries.name: Ion Cannon Batteries
ion-cannon-batteries.ability: Blue :critical:: Choose and discard 1 command token from the defender. If the defender does not have any command tokens, the defending hull zone loses 1 shield instad.

leading-shots.author: Fantasy Flight Games
leading-shots.name: Leading Shots
leading-shots.ability: While attacking, you may spend 1 blue die to reroll any number of dice in your attack pool.

ms1-ion-cannon.author: Fantasy Flight Games
ms1-ion-cannon.name: MS-1 Ion Cannon
ms1-ion-cannon.ability: Blue :crit:: Choose and exhaust 1 of the defender's upgrade cards.

nk-7-ion-cannons.author: Fantasy Flight Games
nk-7-ion-cannons.name: NK-7 Ion Cannons
nk-7-ion-cannons.ability: Blue :critical: : Exhaust this card to force the defender to choose and discard 1 of its defense tokens.

overload-pulse.author: Fantasy Flight Games
overload-pulse.name: Overload Pulse
overload-pulse.ability: BLUE :crit: : Exhaust all of the defender's defense tokens.

point-defense-ion-cannons.author: Fantasy Flight Games
point-defense-ion-cannons.name: Point Defense Ion Cannons
point-defense-ion-cannons.ability: While defending at close range or distance 1, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may force the attacker to reroll 1 die of your choice.

sw-7-ion-batteries.author: Fantasy Flight Games
sw-7-ion-batteries.name: SW-7 Ion Batteries
sw-7-ion-batteries.ability: While attacking a ship, each of your unspent blue :accuracy: icons adds 1 damage to the damage total.

advanced-transponder-net.author: Fantasy Flight Games
advanced-transponder-net.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
advanced-transponder-net.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
advanced-transponder-net.name: Advanced Transponder Net
advanced-transponder-net.ability:
Modification.
Friendly heavy squadrons at distance 1-2 prevent engaged squadrons from attacking ships.

b2-rocket-troopers.author: Fantasy Flight Games
b2-rocket-troopers.name: B2 Rocket Troopers
b2-rocket-troopers.ability: While performing a non-:salvo: attack against a ship at close-medium range, you may exhaust this card. If you do, the defender gains 1 raid token of your choice. While attacking a squadron, you may exhaust this card. If you do, add 1 die of a color already in your attack pool to your attack pool.

boosted-comms.author: Fantasy Flight Games
boosted-comms.name: Boosted Comms
boosted-comms.ability: :squadron: : You can activate friendly squadrons at close-long range (instead of close-medium).

disposable-capacitors.author: Fantasy Flight Games
disposable-capacitors.name: Disposable Capacitors
disposable-capacitors.ability: When you activate, you may discard this card. If you do, the blue dice in your battery armament can be used while attacking ships at close-long range until the end of the round.

expanded-hangar-bay.author: Fantasy Flight Games
expanded-hangar-bay.name: Expanded Hangar Bay
expanded-hangar-bay.ability: Your squadron value is increased by 1.

flag-bridge.author: Fantasy Flight Games
flag-bridge.name: Flag Bridge
flag-bridge.ability:
Medium or large ship only.
Flagship only.
Modification
You gain 1 :fleet-command: icon in your upgrade bar.
You cannot spend a command token to resolve a :fleet-command: card's effect.

flak-guns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
flak-guns.name: Flak Guns
flak-guns.ability: Treat each die in your anti-squadron armament as black. While performing a :salvo: attack, the black dice in your battery armament can be used at medium range and the blue dice in your battery armament can be used at long range.

hardened-bulkheads.author: Fantasy Flight Games
hardened-bulkheads.name: Hardened Bulkheads
hardened-bulkheads.ability:
Large ship only.
When you overlap a ship of a smaller size class (or are overlapped by a ship of a smaller size class), deal 1 fewer facedown damage card to your ship.

hyperspace-rings.author: Fantasy Flight Games
hyperspace-rings.name: Hyperspace Rings
hyperspace-rings.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may choose a number of friendly, non-rogue squadrons up to your squadron value. Those squadrons gain scout.

hyperwave-signal-boost.author: Fantasy Flight Games
hyperwave-signal-boost.name: Hyperwave Signal Boost
hyperwave-signal-boost.ability: During the Squadron Phase, when it is your fleet's turn to activate squadrons, you may exhaust this card to choose a number of unactivated, friendly squadrons at close-long range up to you squadron value. This turn, activate each of those squadrons. While attacking, each of those squadrons with AI are treated as if activated by a :squadron: command.

phylon-q7-tractor-beams.author: Fantasy Flight Games
phylon-q7-tractor-beams.name: Phylon Q7 Tractor Beams
phylon-q7-tractor-beams.ability:
_Modification_. 
When you activate, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 enemy ship of your size class or smaller at distance 1-5. That ship must spend a :navigate: token or reduce its speed by 1 to a minimum of 1.

point-defense-reroute.author: Fantasy Flight Games
point-defense-reroute.expansion: Assault Frigate Mark II Expansion Pack SWM05
point-defense-reroute.name: Point-Defense Reroute
point-defense-reroute.ability: While attacking a squadron at close range, you may reroll your :critical: icons

proximity-mines.author: Fantasy Flight Games
proximity-mines.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
proximity-mines.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
proximity-mines.name: Proximity Mines
proximity-mines.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may discard this card to place a number of proximity mine tokens equal to half your engineering value, rounded down. You may place these mines anywhere in the play area beyond distance 5 of enemy ships (and distance 1 of each other).

quad-laser-turrets.author: Fantasy Flight Games
quad-laser-turrets.name: Quad Laser Turrets
quad-laser-turrets.ability: While defending at distance 1, if the attacker is a squadron, you have Counter 1.

rapid-launch-bays.author: Fantasy Flight Games
rapid-launch-bays.name: Rapid Launch Bays
rapid-launch-bays.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may set aside a number of friendly squadrons up to your squadron value next to your ship card. :squadron: : For each squadron you would activate with this command, you may place 1 of your set-aside squadrons within distance 1. It cannot move this activation.

reserve-hangar-deck.author: Fantasy Flight Games
reserve-hangar-deck.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada

boarding-engineers-boarding-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
boarding-engineers-boarding-team.name: Boarding Engineers
boarding-engineers-boarding-team.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. Look at its facedown damage cards and flip a number of them faceup up to your engineering value (one at a time).

boarding-troopers-boarding-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
boarding-troopers-boarding-team.name: Boarding Troopers
boarding-troopers-boarding-team.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. Choose and spend a number of its defense tokens up to your squadron value.

cham-syndulla-boarding-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
cham-syndulla-boarding-team.name: Cham Syndulla
cham-syndulla-boarding-team.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. If you do you may choose a new command for each command dial assigned to that ship.

darth-vader-boarding-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
darth-vader-boarding-team.name: Darth Vader
darth-vader-boarding-team.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. Choose and discard 1 non-:commander: upgrade card equipped to that ship.

jyn-erso-boarding-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
jyn-erso-boarding-team.name: Jyn Erso
jyn-erso-boarding-team.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. If that ship has no raid tokens, it gains 2 raid tokens of your choice. If that ship has an objective token, you may also gain 1 victory token.

shriv-suurgav-boarding-team.author: Fantasy Flight Games
shriv-suurgav-boarding-team.name: Shriv Suurgav
shriv-suurgav-boarding-team.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. Choose and discard 1 :weapons-team:, :support-team:, :offensive-retro:, :defensive-retro:, :ordnance:, :ion-cannon:, or :turbolaser: upgrade card equipped to that ship.
